channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ディズニーの映画スタジオ社長ショーン・ベイリーが退任、サーチライトの共同社長デヴィッド・グリーンバウムが後任に (Deadline)
item.description:
Deadline:
Disney's President of Motion Picture Studios, Sean Bailey, steps down; Searchlight's co-President David Greenbaum takes over  —  EXCLUSIVE: Effective immediately, Walt Disney's President of Motion Picture Studios Sean Bailey, who turned the company's animation vault into a multibillion-dollar …

item.title: ー元Metaのー社員2、ー人がー2ーのー2ー元Metaのー元Metaー社員2ーポーランドのーIT企業ーーにーにーあるAIクリックベイトネットワークがーアイオワ州のーClayton County Registerーー（ー）
item.description:
Kate Knibbs / Wired:
Two ex-Meta employees find an AI clickbait network linked to a Polish IT company, which is “domain squatting” on URLs, including Iowa's Clayton County Register  —  When two former Meta employees dug into why the website of Iowa's Clayton County Register was spewing dubious posts about stocks …

item.title: Ampere Analysis：米国では2024年第3四半期に初めてストリーミング収入が有料テレビ受信料収入を追い抜く、ストリーミング配信事業者の広告ティア追加も追い風に（Georg Szalai/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / Hollywood Reporter:
Ampere Analysis: streaming revenue will overtake pay TV subscription revenue in the US for the first time in Q3 2024, helped by streamers' addition of ad tiers  —  Total streaming revenue will hit $17.3 billion, topping $16.7 billion from pay TV, in the third-quarter of 2024, predicts research firm Ampere Analysis.

item.title: 情報源チャーター・コミュニケーションズが、米国21州で500万人以上の顧客を抱えるライバルのアルティスUSAの買収を検討中。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: Charter Communications is exploring a takeover of smaller rival Altice USA, which serves ~5M customers across 21 US states; Altice stock is up 50%+  —  - Charter working with advisers on pursuing smaller rival  — Both firms have suffered with surge in wireless competition

item.title: AIを使って記事を要約し、著者と出版社に公正な報酬を支払うことを目指すニュースリーダーParticle.newsがプライベートベータに入る（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
News reader Particle.news, which uses AI to summarize articles and aims to fairly compensate authors and publishers, enters private beta  —  A team led by former Twitter engineers is rethinking how AI can be used to help people process news and information.

item.title: NBCユニバーサルがテレムンドのニュース部門を率いるエグゼクティブ・バイス・プレジデントにジェンマ・ガルシアを指名、直近ではスペインのRTVE Playでニュースの責任者を務めていた（Natalie Korach/The Wrap）
item.description:
Natalie Korach / The Wrap:
NBCUniversal names Gemma Garcia to lead Telemundo's news division as executive VP of news; most recently, she was the head of news at Spain's RTVE Play  —  The veteran news executive will report directly to chairman of NBCUniversal Telemundo Enterprises Luis Fernández

item.title: Acastの共同設立者が立ち上げたSesamyは、スウェーデンとデンマークのユーザーが1回限りのトランザクションとして単一の記事やポッドキャストを購入できるようにするもので、英国への拡大を計画している（Jess Jones/City A.M.）。
item.description:
Jess Jones / City A.M.:
Sesamy, launched by Acast co-founders to let users in Sweden and Denmark purchase single articles or podcasts as a one-time transaction, plans to expand to UK  —  Could one-off articles and podcast purchases be the future of publishing?  That's the vision of the co-founders of Acast …

item.title: エコノミスト・グループ、ディズニー＋のルーク・ブラッドリー＝ジョーンズ氏をエコノミスト社長に、レオン・サンダース・カルバート氏をエコノミスト・インテリジェンス社長に任命（Mark Stenberg/Adweek）
item.description:
Mark Stenberg / Adweek:
The Economist Group names Disney+ executive Luke Bradley-Jones as The Economist president and Leon Saunders Calvert as Economist Intelligence president  —  The publisher has also appointed a new president of Economist Intelligence  —  The Economist Group announced two key executive hires …

item.title: 1964年の名作『メリー・ポピンズ』の年齢指定が「差別的表現」を理由にUからPGに変更される（Helen Bushby/BBC）
item.description:
Helen Bushby / BBC:
British film censors change the age rating for the classic 1964 film Mary Poppins from U to PG citing “discriminatory language”  —  Mary Poppins, the classic film starring Julie Andrews, has had its age rating raised by British film censors because it features “discriminatory language”.

item.title: 黒人家庭に特化した広告付き無料ストリーミングサービス「BLKFAM」が米国で開始、1,000時間以上の子供向けアニメ作品などを提供（Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Lauren Forristal / TechCrunch:
BLKFAM, a free, ad-supported streaming service focused on Black families, launches in the US with 1,000+ hours of kid-friendly animation titles and more  —  BLKFAM is a free, ad-supported, Black-focused family streaming service launching today to give Black Americans access to more than 1,000 hours …

item.title: フランスのCanal+ Groupが、アジアのストリーミング・プラットフォームViuへの出資比率を30%（約3億ドル相当）に引き上げ、50%に引き上げるオプションも保有すると発表（Patrick Frater/Variety
item.description:
Patrick Frater / Variety:
France's Canal+ Group says it has increased its stake in Asian streaming platform Viu to 30%, worth ~$300M, and retains an option to increase its stake to 50%  —  UPPING THE ANTE  —  France's Canal+ Group said that it has increased its stake in multi-territory Asian streaming platform Viu to 30%.

item.title: 英Ofcomがメディア法案施行に向けたロードマップを発表、ストリーミング・サービスの規制が本格化するのは2年後と発表（Max Goldbart/Deadline）
item.description:
Max Goldbart / Deadline:
UK's Ofcom delivers its roadmap for implementing the Media Bill, saying regulation of streaming services will not come into place in full for two years  —  Streamer regulation in the UK will not come into place in full for two years, Ofcom said today.  —  Delivering its roadmap for implementing …

item.title: TVニュースの元幹部らがOfcomを批判、GB Newsが調査の足を引っ張ることで放送の公平性規則に違反することを許した（The Guardian）
item.description:
The Guardian:
Former TV news executives and others criticize Ofcom for allowing GB News to violate broadcasting impartiality rules by dragging its feet with investigations  —  Ofcom is accused of not treating all broadcasters the same and of dragging its feet with investigations into the rightwing channel

item.title: ローカルニュースに5年間で5億ドルを投資し、さらに5億ドルの資金調達を目指す慈善活動「プレス・フォワード」の初代ディレクター、デール・アングリンのプロフィール（コロンビア・ジャーナリズム・レビュー誌）
item.description:
Columbia Journalism Review:
A profile of Dale Anglin, first director of Press Forward, a philanthropic effort to invest $500M over five years in local news and aiming to raise $500M more  —  Dale R. Anglin has spent more than twenty years in the nonprofit sector, channeling millions of dollars to social service organizations.

item.title: オーストラリアの実業家ケリー・ストークスが、億万長者のケイティ・ペイジ、クリス・エリソン、ジーナ・リネハートの支援を受け、日刊オンライン新聞「ザ・ナイトリー」を創刊（Sam Buckingham-Jones/Australian ...）
item.description:
Sam Buckingham-Jones / Australian Financial Review:
Australian businessman Kerry Stokes launches The Nightly, a daily online newspaper with backing from billionaires Katie Page, Chris Ellison, and Gina Rinehart  —  Billionaires Katie Page, Chris Ellison and Gina Rinehart are the key backers of Kerry Stokes' new daily online newspaper …
